snippet: China has set itself a staggering task to cure its smothering pollution: switching coal-fired boilers and heating systems in at least 1.2 million households in 28 of its smoggiest northern cities to run on gas or electricity. By October....

headline.main: UK Manufacturers Enjoy Post-Brexit Surge in Orders: Survey
headline.print_headline: UK Manufacturers Enjoy Post-Brexit Surge in Orders: Survey

lead_paragraph: China has set itself a staggering task to cure its smothering pollution: switching coal-fired boilers and heating systems in at least 1.2 million households in 28 of its smoggiest northern cities to run on gas or electricity. By October.
